faqs.answer: Home loan interest 8.5-9.5% floating rate hai. Aapke CIBIL score pe final rate decide hoga.
EMI loan amount, tenure (5-30 years), aur interest rate se calculate hoti hai. Details share kijiye exact calculation ke liye.
Eligibility ke liye income proof, property papers, CIBIL score (750+), aur 21+ age chahiye. Documents share kar sakte hain?
Salary slips (3 months), bank statements (6 months), property papers, PAN/Aadhar, CIBIL report chahiye.
